TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Tab/TopTabItem extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Tab::TopTabItem abstract sealed

summary.span: 为选项卡控件的每种状态提供 对象，该选项卡控件与其他选项卡控件共享其下边框、左边框和右边框。

span.span: Provides objects for each state of a tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个属性类返回共享其下的选项卡控件的不同状态，左和右边框与其他选项卡控件。Each property of the class returns a for a different state of a tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建与返回属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 处理窗体的事件并调用`DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItem1`方法从事件处理方法，并传递`e`作为。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItem1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#122)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

summary.span: 获取表示被禁用的选项卡控件的视觉样式元素，该选项卡控件与其他选项卡控件共享其下边框、左边框和右边框。

span.span: Gets a visual style element that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

span.span: A that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.
